subject: INTER BANK NIGERIA PLC
body:
INTER BANK NIGERIA PLC
HEAD OFFICE:LAGOS NIGERIA
Tel:+ 2347088665016
 Attn ; SIR
 We received instruction from the PRESIDENT OF NIGERIA that all contractors
 that are due to received their payment will received their fund through
 MASTER CARD payment system, You are required to reconfirm your
 information to enable us commence the processing of your fund into
 your account. You are advice to stop every communication with any body
 or group of people regarding to this payment.
 Your urgent attention is needed in regards to this payment.
 I wait from your prompt response.
 Yours faithfully
 DR. WILLIAM JON

subject: Re: INTER BANK NIGERIA PLC
body:
Dear Dr. William Jon,

Thank you for your email. However, I would like to clarify a few things before we proceed. Could you please provide more details about the Master Card payment system? Also, could you please explain why I need to stop every communication with any body or group of people regarding this payment?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Loren
